Content.Text:
<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Owwie...that smarts. Wait, what was I doing
again?

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you for your offerings. Getting them
always makes me smile.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I should give you a little something to say
thanks, <MYNAME>. Hmm...what present would
be just right for the occasion?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I know! How about a <GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>!
No need to be shy. Consider it a reward for your
devotion.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you for your offerings. Getting them
always makes me smile.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>So, what would you like for a reward this time?
Oh, what's that? You'll let me pick?
Uhhhmmm...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I've got it! I'll give you a
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>! Go on, take it. Don't
be a stranger now.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you for your offerings. Getting them
always makes me smile.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You're really a nice person, <MYNAME>. No need
to be shy; you're someone people can count on.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH> All right, this time I'll give you a
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>! No need to thank me.
Consider it a reward for your devotion.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you for your offerings. Getting them
always makes me smile.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I really like this little town. It's a wonderful place
to live! ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>This time, I've got a <GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>
just for you! Just another present from your
favorite Goddess.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you for your offerings. Getting them
always makes me smile.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You've given me so much, <MYNAME>, so this
time I'm gonna give you something extra-
special.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ta-daaa! It's a <GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>! I hope
you like it. I thought it was pretty neat.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you for your offerings. Getting them
always makes me smile.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>How is your farm doing, <MYNAME>? I hope
your harvests are bountiful. You've got me in
your corner, after all.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>This time I'll give you a
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>! No need to thank me,
being a steadfast devotee has its perks.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you for your offerings. Getting them
always makes me smile.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>How is your farm doing, <MYNAME>? Is work
keeping your hands full? Are all your animals still
fluffy?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, guess what? I've got a
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN> right here for you! Go
on, take it. You deserve this!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you for your offerings. Getting them
always makes me smile.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>We've been in this town for quite a while now,
huh?
<PAGE>
But...you're the only one who's given me this
many offerings, <MYNAME>. I really appreciate
your devotion.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I wanted to give you this
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN> as a sign of our lasting
friendship. I hope you enjoy it.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thank you for your offerings. Getting them
always makes me smile.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I never expected to receive such a bounty of
gifts. The Nature Sprites can hardly contain their
excitement.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Prepare yourself to be blessed...with this 
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>! Think of it as a thank-
you for always sticking by li'l Dessie.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa, <MYNAME>, you're the bestest human
EVER!
<PAGE>
Er...sorry, I didn't mean to shout, really. I just
had a spasm of joy for a second there.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>When I told everyone at home how many
offerings I got, I was showered with praise!
<PAGE>
I couldn't have done it without you, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
This time, I've prepared a super ultra mega
present. Take this <GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>, you
deserve it more than anyone!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, I'll be floating along home, then. Bye-bye,
<MYNAME>!
